title: PMS 2.0 304 - Wednesday Afternoon Football Preview, Kirk Cousins, Mark Schlereth, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys preview today's Wednesday Afternoon Football tilt between the Steelers and the Ravens, what bets he likes for today's game, if the Steelers will cover, and much more. Also joining the show is 2x Pro Bowler, Quarterback for the Minnesota Vikings, Kirk Cousins. Pat and Kirk chat about the "if I die, I die," comments, his career arc so far, what he loves about Adam Thielen and Justin Jefferson, why thinks didn't work out with Stefon Diggs, and much more (14:36-33:31). Next, 3x Super Bowl Champion, 2x Pro Bowler, member of the Denver Broncos 50th Anniversary Team, color commentator for the NFL on FOX, and friend of the program, Mark Schlereth joins the show to tell a few stories, chat about commentating in the NFL, what it's like as a player during Super Bowl week, who he thinks the best offensive lineman in the NFL is, and who he likes in this afternoon's game (35:42-1:02:07). Later, on another installment of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk, Pat and AJ chat about the hot water Kirk Herbstreit found himself in last night on the College Football Playoff Rankings show, their thoughts on today's game, and they answer some questions from other sports shows about Aaron Rodgers and Tom Brady/Bruce Arians (1:02:09-1:48:06). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
